attributes.action: OPPOSE SAME SEX MARRIAGE BILL ON 20/5/13
attributes.additional_details:
On TUE 20/05/13 the House of Commons is going ahead & looking to make SAME SEX MARRIAGES legal. This will mean your infant children will be taught in schools that a MAN marrying a MAN is acceptable - a WOMAN marrying a WOMAN is acceptable. Same Sex couples will be fast tracked to having foster children and no one will be able to stop this. By the age of 9 years - The concept of same sex marriages being acceptable will be embedded in your child's mind.
YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO STOP THE SCHOOL TEACHING YOUR CHILDREN ABOUT SAME SEX MARRIAGE. YOUR CHILDREN WILL READ BOOKS SUCH AS: * MOM & MUM ARE GETTING MARRIED * DADDY, PAPA & ME. See link below :
http://c4m.org.uk/downloads/schools.pdf

EMAIL YOUR MP NOW AND ENSURE HE/SHE VOTES AGAINST THIS BILL.
 SAVE THE FUTURE OF YOUR CHILDREN NOW.
 YOU MUST EMAIL YOUR MP BY THIS FRIDAY 17/05/13 4PM.
